conbody.p: Spark executoron DatabricksDatabricks cluster managerwith the Spark executorWhen using the Spark executor with Databricks, you can run jobs based on notebooks or JARs.
Before you use the Spark executor, perform the necessary prerequisites.

When you configure the executor, you specify the cluster base URL, job type, job ID, and user credentials. You can optionally configure job parameters and you can use the expression language in job parameters. For example, when performing post-processing on an Amazon S3 object, you could use the following expression to retrieve the object key name from the event record: ${record:field('/objectKey')}
You also can configure an HTTP proxy and SSL/TLS details.
